feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: Valancy shivered like a tree the wind stirs suddenly. Something seemed to sweep over her soul. 'My Blue Castle!' she said. 'Oh, my Blue Castle!'

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: Valancy found herself shivering with the rapture of her first kiss.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Valancy stared at Cousin Georgiana for a moment. Then she wanted to go off into a peal of laughter. But she only said: 'Me?'

feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: Valancy wanted to go off into a peal of laughter. But she only said: 'Me?'

feels.name: Contentment
feels.quote: Valancy was so happy that she could have smiled at anybodyâ€”even Uncle James.

feels.name: Shock
feels.quote: Valancy stared at Cousin Georgiana. 'Married!' she said. 'Yes. I was married to Barney Snaith last Tuesday evening in Port Lawrence.'

feels.name: Despair
feels.quote: Cousin Georgiana choked back the tears and gave a little moan of despair instead. 'Oh, Doss, what have you done? What have you done?'
